TEXT.TITLE: GENERAL AUTOMATION <GENA> SETS LEASING PACT
TEXT.BODY: General Automation Inc said it has arranged a ten-mln-dlr leasing facility with Wells Fargo and Co's <WFC> Wells Fargo Leasing Corp. The program is a one-year facility that will allow financing for ZEBRA computers, other General Automation systems and applications sofware, the company said. Reuter
